channel.title: 👨🏻‍💻 开发 on Banbu1118's Blog

item.title: Imagemagick工具创建图片
item.description: #!/bin/bash #安装imagemagick工具 apt install imagemagick -y # 设置图片参数 width=600 height=800 background_color="lightblue" text_color="white" output_file="opendesk_image_imagemagick.png" text="OpenDesk" # 生成图片 convert -size ${width}x${height} xc:${background_color} -fill ${text_color} \ -gravity center -pointsize 48 -annotate +0+0 "${text}" ${output_file} echo "图片已生成：${output_file}"
